data.feedback: Epic follows Clean Architecture perfectly with excellent pattern documentation. All filesToCreate are truly new, filesToModify (except router path in epic metadata) are valid. Stories have correct technical guidance that matches existing codebase patterns exactly.
issues: Epic filesToModify lists non-existent lib/core/router/app_router.dart (but Story 4 correctly references lib/app.dart)
suggestions: Update epic filesToModify to replace lib/core/router/app_router.dart with lib/app.dart
Story 5 should check existing endpoints in api_endpoints.dart before adding duplicates
